title: Palms Up Together Medium Light Skin Tone
description: Two hands, palms facing upwards and together, often used to signify prayer, pleading, offering, or receiving. The medium-light skin tone specifies the appearance.
apple_vendor_description: The palms up together emoji on Apple devices features two hands held open, palms facing the viewer, with a gentle medium-light skin tone and subtle, realistic lighting. Apple's design imbues these hands with a soft, inviting curvature and a glossy sheen, suggesting a gesture of openness, offering, or pleading. It's commonly used on Apple devices to express gratitude, asking for a favor, or offering help.
